long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Modify YouTube thumbnails to include Eric's special seasoning

Spice up your YouTube experience with Eric's Thumbnail Seasoning! Tired of the same old thumbnails blending into the background? Say goodbye to bland browsing and hello to a flavor-packed journey through YouTube. Eric's Thumbnail Seasoning adds a dash of excitement to every thumbnail, ensuring each video catches your eye with tantalizing visuals. Don't settle for boring browsing, give your YouTube journey the seasoning it deserves with Eric's Thumbnail Seasoning plugin!

Compatible with all browsers. 

Notes:
This extension was made by @Eric_The_Toon and you can find him at (https://twitter.com/Eric_The_Toon) and (https://www.youtube.com/@EricTheToon)
This extension is in partnership with EricTheToon and is not affiliated with anyone featured or YouTube.
I have done no work on this extension outside adding to the README, Manifest, and publishing it on extension sites.
